document_data.name: Citadel Yaunoroth
document_data.mainbody: '''Citadel Yaunoroth''' was a [[dwarven]] city of [[Ammarindar (kingdom)|Ammarindar]], built during the [[Age of Humanity]] as a stalwart fortress to protect the kingdom from the growing [[orc]] hordes.
document_data.Description: Built into the [[Greypeak Mountains]] that overlooked [[Bleached Bones Pass|Naurogloth]], this ancient dwarfhold extended under the peaks with a network of subterranean tunnels. A single, [[goblin]]-made burrow extended from the lower reaches of the tunnels to the [[Dekanter|Mines of Dekanter]].
document_data.History:
The construction of Yaunoroth was completed in [[1 DR]], the same year [[human]]s of the [[Dalelands]] and [[elves]] of the [[Cormanthyr]] erected the [[Standing Stone]].

When [[demon]]s from [[Ascalhorn]] ravaged [[the North]] in [[882 DR]], The spirit of Olmma continued to command the [[ghost]]s of the dwarves that perished in defense of the city for centuries later.
